parameters.name: inputTopic
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic for raw telemetry, e.g. projects/PROJECT/topics/cab-telemetry

parameters.name: alertTopic
parameters.label: Alert Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic for idle alerts, e.g. projects/PROJECT/topics/cab-idle-alerts

parameters.name: rawTable
parameters.label: Raw BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw telemetry, e.g. PROJECT:dataset.table
